success_criteria: Linting passes; Unit test coverage for changed files > 90%; All unit tests pass; No new critical issues in SAST scan.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and simple bugs from entering the main branch.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for deployment to Staging
success_criteria: All integration tests pass; All critical path E2E smoke tests pass; SCA and container vulnerability scans report no new critical vulnerabilities.
failure_action: Block deployment; Alert DevOps and QA lead.
tools_used: GitHub Actions; Supertest; Cypress; Snyk; Trivy.
escalation_procedure: Go/No-Go meeting with Tech Lead and Product Owner.
business_impact: Prevents major regressions and security issues from reaching the staging environment.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for Blue/Green deployment to Production
success_criteria: Full regression E2E suite passes against Staging; Performance benchmark tests pass; Manual sign-off from QA Lead and Product Owner; No outstanding critical bugs.
failure_action: Cancel production release; Initiate root cause analysis.
business_impact: Final checkpoint to ensure a high-quality, stable release is delivered to users.
